00056 bool hql_needs_quotes(const char *name) {
00057   if (!isalpha(*name))
00058     return true;
00059   else {
00060     for (; *name; name++) {
00061       if (!isalnum(*name)) {
00062         return true;
00063       }
00064     }
00065   }
00066   return false;
00067 }

00074 Schema::Schema(bool read_ids) : m_error_string(), m_next_column_id(0), m_access_group_map(), m_column_family_map(), m_generation(1), m_access_groups(), m_open_access_group(0), m_open_column_family(0), m_read_ids(read_ids), m_output_ids(false), m_max_column_family_id(0) {
00075   if (Logger::logger == 0) {
00076     cerr << "Logger::initialize must be called before using Schema class" << endl;
00077     exit(1);
00078   }
00079 }

00081 
00082 Schema::~Schema() {
00083   for (list<AccessGroup *>::const_iterator agiter = m_access_groups.begin(); agiter != m_access_groups.end(); agiter++)
00084     delete *agiter;
00085   for (ColumnFamilyMap::const_iterator iter = m_column_family_map.begin(); iter != m_column_family_map.end(); iter++)
00086     delete (*iter).second;
00087 }

00090 Schema *Schema::new_instance(const char *buf, int len, bool read_ids) {
00091   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(ms_mutex);
00092   XML_Parser parser = XML_ParserCreate("US-ASCII");
00093 
00094   XML_SetElementHandler(parser, &start_element_handler, &end_element_handler);
00095   XML_SetCharacterDataHandler(parser, &character_data_handler);
00096 
00097   ms_schema = new Schema(read_ids);
00098 
00099   if (XML_Parse(parser, buf, len, 1) == 0) {
00100     String errstr = (String)"Schema Parse Error: " + (const char *)XML_ErrorString(XML_GetErrorCode(parser)) + " line " + (int)XML_GetCurrentLineNumber(parser) + ", offset " + (int)XML_GetCurrentByteIndex(parser);
00101     ms_schema->set_error_string(errstr);
00102   }
00103 
00104   XML_ParserFree(parser);
00105 
00106   Schema *schema = ms_schema;
00107   ms_schema = 0;
00108   return schema;
00109 }

00111 
00114 void Schema::start_element_handler(void *userdata,
00115                          const XML_Char *name,
00116                          const XML_Char **atts) {
00117   int i;
00118 
00119   if (!strcasecmp(name, "Schema")) {
00120     for (i=0; atts[i] != 0; i+=2) {
00121       if (atts[i+1] == 0)
00122         return;
00123       if (ms_schema->m_read_ids && !strcasecmp(atts[i], "generation"))
00124         ms_schema->set_generation(atts[i+1]);
00125       else if (!strcasecmp(atts[i], "compressor"))
00126         ms_schema->set_compressor((String)atts[i+1]);
00127       else
00128         ms_schema->set_error_string((string)"Unrecognized 'Schema' attribute : " + atts[i]);
00129     }
00130   }
00131   else if (!strcasecmp(name, "AccessGroup")) {
00132     ms_schema->open_access_group();
00133     for (i=0; atts[i] != 0; i+=2) {
00134       if (atts[i+1] == 0)
00135         return;
00136       ms_schema->set_access_group_parameter(atts[i], atts[i+1]);
00137     }
00138   }
00139   else if (!strcasecmp(name, "ColumnFamily")) {
00140     ms_schema->open_column_family();
00141     for (i=0; atts[i] != 0; i+=2) {
00142       if (atts[i+1] == 0)
00143         return;
00144       ms_schema->set_column_family_parameter(atts[i], atts[i+1]);
00145     }
00146   }
00147   else if (!strcasecmp(name, "MaxVersions") || !strcasecmp(name, "ttl") || !strcasecmp(name, "Name"))
00148     ms_collected_text = "";
00149   else
00150     ms_schema->set_error_string((string)"Unrecognized element - '" + name + "'");
00151 
00152   return;
00153 }
00154 
00155 
00156 void Schema::end_element_handler(void *userdata, const XML_Char *name) {
00157   if (!strcasecmp(name, "AccessGroup"))
00158     ms_schema->close_access_group();
00159   else if (!strcasecmp(name, "ColumnFamily"))
00160     ms_schema->close_column_family();
00161   else if (!strcasecmp(name, "MaxVersions") || !strcasecmp(name, "ttl") || !strcasecmp(name, "Name")) {
00162     boost::trim(ms_collected_text);
00163     ms_schema->set_column_family_parameter(name, ms_collected_text.c_str());
00164   }
00165 }

00168 
00169 void Schema::character_data_handler(void *userdata, const XML_Char *s, int len) {
00170   ms_collected_text.assign(s, len);
00171 }

00175 void Schema::open_access_group() {
00176   if (m_open_access_group != 0)
00177     set_error_string((string)"Nested AccessGroup elements not allowed");
00178   else {
00179     m_open_access_group = new AccessGroup();
00180   }
00181 }
00182 
00183 
00184 
00185 void Schema::close_access_group() {
00186   if (m_open_access_group == 0)
00187     set_error_string((string)"Unable to close locality group, not open");
00188   else {
00189     if (m_open_access_group->name == "")
00190       set_error_string((string)"Name attribute required for all AccessGroup elements");
00191     else {
00192       if (m_access_group_map.find(m_open_access_group->name) != m_access_group_map.end())
00193         set_error_string((string)"Multiply defined locality group  '" + m_open_access_group->name + "'");
00194       else {
00195         m_access_group_map[m_open_access_group->name] = m_open_access_group;
00196         m_access_groups.push_back(m_open_access_group);
00197       }
00198     }
00199     m_open_access_group = 0;
00200   }
00201 }

00203 
00204 
00205 void Schema::open_column_family() {
00206   if (m_open_access_group == 0)
00207     set_error_string((string)"ColumnFamily defined outside of AccessGroup");
00208   else {
00209     if (m_open_column_family != 0)
00210       set_error_string((string)"Nested ColumnFamily elements not allowed");
00211     else {
00212       m_open_column_family = new ColumnFamily();
00213       m_open_column_family->id = 0;
00214       m_open_column_family->max_versions = 0;
00215       m_open_column_family->ttl = 0;
00216       m_open_column_family->ag = m_open_access_group->name;
00217     }
00218   }
00219 }
00220 
00221 
00222 
00223 void Schema::close_column_family() {
00224   if (m_open_access_group == 0)
00225     set_error_string((string)"ColumnFamily defined outside of AccessGroup");
00226   else if (m_open_column_family == 0)
00227     set_error_string((string)"Unable to close column family, not open");
00228   else {
00229     if (m_open_column_family->name == "")
00230       set_error_string((string)"ColumnFamily must have Name child element");
00231     else if (m_read_ids && m_open_column_family->id == 0) {
00232       set_error_string((string)"No id specifid for ColumnFamily '" + m_open_column_family->name + "'");
00233     }
00234     else {
00235       if (m_column_family_map.find(m_open_column_family->name) != m_column_family_map.end())
00236         set_error_string((string)"Multiply defined column families '" + m_open_column_family->name + "'");
00237       else {
00238         m_column_family_map[m_open_column_family->name] = m_open_column_family;
00239         if (m_read_ids)
00240           m_column_family_id_map[m_open_column_family->id] = m_open_column_family;
00241         m_open_access_group->columns.push_back(m_open_column_family);
00242       }
00243       m_open_column_family = 0;
00244     }
00245   }
00246 }

00249 
00250 void Schema::set_access_group_parameter(const char *param, const char *value) {
00251   if (m_open_access_group == 0)
00252     set_error_string((string)"Unable to set AccessGroup attribute '" + param + "', locality group not open");
00253   else {
00254     if (!strcasecmp(param, "name"))
00255       m_open_access_group->name = value;
00256     else if (!strcasecmp(param, "inMemory")) {
00257       if (!strcasecmp(value, "true") || !strcmp(value, "1"))
00258         m_open_access_group->in_memory = true;
00259       else if (!strcasecmp(value, "false") || !strcmp(value, "0"))
00260         m_open_access_group->in_memory = false;
00261       else
00262         set_error_string((string)"Invalid value (" + value + ") for AccessGroup attribute '" + param + "'");
00263     }
00264     else if (!strcasecmp(param, "blksz")) {
00265       long long blocksize = strtoll(value, 0, 10);
00266       if (blocksize == 0 || blocksize >= 4294967296LL)
00267         set_error_string((string)"Invalid value (" + value + ") for AccessGroup attribute '" + param + "'");
00268       else
00269         m_open_access_group->blocksize = (uint32_t)blocksize;
00270     }
00271     else if (!strcasecmp(param, "compressor")) {
00272       m_open_access_group->compressor = value;
00273       boost::trim(m_open_access_group->compressor);
00274     }
00275     else
00276       set_error_string((string)"Invalid AccessGroup attribute '" + param + "'");
00277   }
00278 }

00280 
00281 
00282 void Schema::set_column_family_parameter(const char *param, const char *value) {
00283   if (m_open_column_family == 0)
00284     set_error_string((string)"Unable to set ColumnFamily parameter '" + param + "', column family not open");
00285   else {
00286     if (!strcasecmp(param, "Name"))
00287       m_open_column_family->name = value;
00288     else if (!strcasecmp(param, "ttl")) {
00289       long long secs = strtoll(value, 0, 10);
00290       m_open_column_family->ttl = (time_t)secs;
00291     }
00292     else if (!strcasecmp(param, "MaxVersions")) {
00293       m_open_column_family->max_versions = atoi(value);
00294       if (m_open_column_family->max_versions == 0)
00295         set_error_string((string)"Invalid value (" + value + ") for MaxVersions");
00296     }
00297     else if (m_read_ids && !strcasecmp(param, "id")) {
00298       m_open_column_family->id = atoi(value);
00299       if (m_open_column_family->id == 0)
00300         set_error_string((string)"Invalid value (" + value + ") for ColumnFamily id attribute");
00301       if (m_open_column_family->id > m_max_column_family_id)
00302         m_max_column_family_id = m_open_column_family->id;
00303     }
00304     else
00305       set_error_string((string)"Invalid ColumnFamily parameter '" + param + "'");
00306   }
00307 }
00308 
00309 
00310 void Schema::assign_ids() {
00311   m_max_column_family_id = 0;
00312   for (list<AccessGroup *>::iterator ag_it = m_access_groups.begin(); ag_it != m_access_groups.end(); ag_it++) {
00313     for (list<ColumnFamily *>::iterator cf_it = (*ag_it)->columns.begin(); cf_it != (*ag_it)->columns.end(); cf_it++) {
00314       (*cf_it)->id = ++m_max_column_family_id;
00315     }
00316   }
00317   m_generation = 1;
00318   m_output_ids=true;
00319 }

00321 
00322 void Schema::render(String &output) {
00323   char buf[64];
00324 
00325   if (!is_valid()) {
00326     output = m_error_string;
00327     return;
00328   }
00329 
00330   output += "<Schema";
00331   if (m_output_ids)
00332     output += (String)" generation=\"" + (uint32_t)m_generation + "\"";
00333   if (m_compressor != "")
00334     output += (String)" compressor=\"" + m_compressor + "\"";
00335   output += ">\n";
00336 
00337   for (list<AccessGroup *>::iterator iter = m_access_groups.begin(); iter != m_access_groups.end(); iter++) {
00338     output += (string)"  <AccessGroup name=\"" + (*iter)->name + "\"";
00339     if ((*iter)->in_memory)
00340       output += " inMemory=\"true\"";
00341     if ((*iter)->blocksize > 0)
00342       output += (String)" blksz=\"" + (*iter)->blocksize + "\"";
00343     if ((*iter)->compressor != "")
00344       output += (String)" compressor=\"" + (*iter)->compressor + "\"";
00345     output += ">\n";
00346     for (list<ColumnFamily *>::iterator cfiter = (*iter)->columns.begin(); cfiter != (*iter)->columns.end(); cfiter++) {
00347       output += (string)"    <ColumnFamily";
00348       if (m_output_ids) {
00349         output += " id=\"";
00350         sprintf(buf, "%d", (*cfiter)->id);
00351         output += (string)buf + "\"";
00352       }
00353       output += ">\n";
00354       output += (string)"      <Name>" + (*cfiter)->name + "</Name>\n";
00355       if ((*cfiter)->max_versions != 0)
00356         output += (string)"      <MaxVersions>" + (*cfiter)->max_versions + "</MaxVersions>\n";
00357       if ((*cfiter)->ttl != 0)
00358         output += (string)"      <ttl>" + (uint32_t)(*cfiter)->ttl + "</ttl>\n";
00359       output += (string)"    </ColumnFamily>\n";
00360     }
00361     output += (string)"  </AccessGroup>\n";
00362   }
00363 
00364   output += "</Schema>\n";
00365   return;
00366 }
00367 
00368 void Schema::render_hql_create_table(const String &table_name, String &output) {
00369   output += "\n";
00370   output += "CREATE TABLE ";
00371 
00372   if (m_compressor != "")
00373     output += (String)"COMPRESSOR=\"" + m_compressor + "\" ";
00374 
00375   output += table_name + " (\n";
00376 
00377   foreach(const ColumnFamilyMap::value_type &v, m_column_family_map) {
00378     // check to see if column family name needs quotes around it
00379     if (hql_needs_quotes(v.first.c_str()))
00380       output += (String)"  '" + v.first + "'";
00381     else
00382       output += (String)"  " + v.first;
00383 
00384     if (v.second->max_versions != 0)
00385       output += (String)" MAX_VERSIONS=" + v.second->max_versions;
00386 
00387     if (v.second->ttl != 0)
00388       output += (String)" TTL=" + (uint32_t)v.second->ttl;
00389 
00390     output += (String)",\n";
00391   }
00392 
00393   size_t i = 1;
00394 
00395   foreach(const AccessGroup *ag, m_access_groups) {
00396     output += (String)"  ACCESS GROUP ";
00397 
00398     if (hql_needs_quotes(ag->name.c_str()))
00399       output += (String)"'" + ag->name + "'";
00400     else
00401       output += ag->name;
00402 
00403     if (ag->in_memory)
00404       output += (String)" IN_MEMORY";
00405 
00406     if (ag->blocksize != 0)
00407       output += (String)" BLOCKSIZE=" + ag->blocksize;
00408 
00409     if (ag->compressor != "")
00410       output += (String)" COMPRESSOR=\"" + ag->compressor + "\"";
00411 
00412     if (!ag->columns.empty()) {
00413       bool display_comma = false;
00414       output += (String)" (";
00415 
00416       foreach(const ColumnFamily *cf, ag->columns) {
00417         // check to see if column family name needs quotes around it
00418         if (display_comma)
00419           output += (String)", ";
00420         else
00421           display_comma = true;
00422 
00423         if (hql_needs_quotes(cf->name.c_str()))
00424           output += (String)"'" + cf->name + "'";
00425         else
00426           output += cf->name;
00427       }
00428       output += (String)")";
00429     }
00430     if (i == m_access_groups.size())
00431       output += (String)"\n";
00432     else
00433       output += (String)",\n";
00434   }
00435 
00436   output += ")\n";
00437   output += "\n";
00438 }

00445 bool Schema::is_valid() {
00446   if (get_error_string() != 0)
00447     return false;
00448   return true;
00449 }

00454 void Schema::set_generation(const char *generation) {
00455   int gen_num = atoi(generation);
00456   if (gen_num <= 0)
00457     set_error_string((string)"Invalid Table 'generation' value (" + generation + ")");
00458   m_generation = gen_num;
00459 }

00461 
00462 void Schema::add_access_group(AccessGroup *ag) {
00463   AccessGroupMap::const_iterator iter = m_access_group_map.find(ag->name);
00464 
00465   if (iter != m_access_group_map.end()) {
00466     m_error_string = String("Access group '") + ag->name + "' multiply defined";
00467     delete ag;
00468     return;
00469   }
00470 
00471   m_access_group_map[ag->name] = ag;
00472   m_access_groups.push_back(ag);
00473 }
00474 
00475 void Schema::add_column_family(ColumnFamily *cf) {
00476   ColumnFamilyMap::const_iterator cf_iter = m_column_family_map.find(cf->name);
00477 
00478   if (cf_iter != m_column_family_map.end()) {
00479     m_error_string = String("Column family '") + cf->name + "' multiply defined";
00480     delete cf;
00481     return;
00482   }
00483 
00484   AccessGroupMap::const_iterator ag_iter = m_access_group_map.find(cf->ag);
00485 
00486   if (ag_iter == m_access_group_map.end()) {
00487     m_error_string = String("Invalid access group '") + cf->ag + "' for column family '" + cf->name + "'";
00488     delete cf;
00489     return;
00490   }
00491 
00492   m_column_family_map[cf->name] = cf;
00493   (*ag_iter).second->columns.push_back(cf);
00494 
00495 }
